Commands.Punch Rush: 4-hit melee BRV attack  Target: 3 turns DEF Down I  Self: 3 turns Duel; 6 turns MAX BRV Up II  Punch Rush becomes Burning Rave, BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ while Duel active
Commands.BRV Attack+: Melee BRV attack.  High turn rate
Commands.Burning Rave: Grants BRV based on ATK, then BRV × 1.2 followed by 2-hit group ranged BRV + single-target HP attack.  Deals 10% HP damage to non-targets.  Cancels Duel
Commands.Booya: Thunder melee BRV attack  Target: 3 turns DEF Down I  Self: 3 turns Duel; 6 turns MAX BRV Up II  Booya becomes Meteor Barrage, BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ while Duel active
Commands.Meteor Barrage: Melee BRV attack + HP attack.  Cancels Duel
Commands.Different Beat: 9-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack  Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%  Self: 6 turns Duel  After use: BRV Attack, BRV Attack+ become Burning Combo; HP Attack becomes Meteor Combo

Artifacts.BRV Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV
Artifacts.Self-taught Martial Arts Boost: Improves the effects of Self-taught Martial Arts by 5%
Artifacts.Mighty Punch Rush: Raises BRV Damage dealt with Punch Rush by 10%
Artifacts.Mighty Booya: Raises BRV Damage dealt with Booya by 10%

Passives.High Tension: Slightly raises Attack for 3 turns when the battle starts
Passives.Punch Rush Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using  Punch Rush
Passives.Smash Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after initiating a Chase Sequence
Passives.Booya Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using  Booya
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy
Passives.Duel Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed while  Duel  is active
Passives.Self-taught Martial Arts: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt while  Duel  is active
Passives.Duel High Speed: Largely raises SPD while Duel active
Passives.Punch Rush Extension: When using Punch Rush:  Higher turn rateAfter using Punch Rush:  Triggers Booya if HP at least 80% of MAXWhen using Burning Rave:  Slight BRV damage boost  Slight HP damage boost to non-targets  Higher turn rate
Passives.Duel Boost: Moderately raises MAX BRV while Duel active
Passives.Booya Extension: When using Booya:  Higher turn rateAfter using Booya:  Triggers Punch Rush if HP at least 80% of MAXWhen using Meteor Barrage:  Slight BRV damage boost  Higher turn rate

Weapons.Ehrgeiz CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Different Beat
Weapons.Maverick CP: 15: When using  Punch Rush ,  Burning Rave :- Raises BRV potencyWhen using  Punch Rush :- Extends the duration of  Duel
Weapons.Gauntlet CP: 35: Booya  use +2When using  Booya ,  Meteor Barrage :- Raises BRV potencyWhen using  Booya :- Extends the duration of  Duel - Improves  Defense Down - Grants  Small Physical Attack Up  for 6 turns
